review.author: Frontend + DevOps
findings: IPC cleanup: 3 missing channels (activity-logged, oracle:image-generated, pane-model-changed) added to RENDERER_IPC_CHANNELS. clearRendererIpcListeners() now covers all registered channels.
ERR-008: Long message Enter delay increased to 200ms base (was 50ms). Defer window 5000ms for long payloads (was 2000ms). Short messages unchanged. Scaling math verified for edge cases.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
